title: Hot NBA Teams, Miles Bridges, Jamal Crawford On New NBA Rules | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Hot NBA Teams, Miles Bridges, Jamal Crawford On New NBA Rules | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Another week of WHAT'S BURNIN is here. Matt and Stak discuss the teams in the NBA off to a hot start, including Knicks, Warriors and the Bulls. Plus, they are joined by NBA legend Jamal Crawford to talk about the new NBA rules and the impact on the game.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
